benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/credits - Create a credit

covered: Valid Payload scenarios for single and multiple credits (TC01, TC02) with required fields
No-invoiceId creates CBA and validates type (TC07)
Validation: positive amount handling and negative requirement (TC13)
Service availability: 503 when API or plugin unavailable (TC17, TC28)
Security tests: SQL injection (TC19) and XSS (TC20)
Edge cases: empty body (TC21), extra fields ignored (TC22), max credits (TC23), large payload (TC24), timeout (TC25)
State-based tests: DB only account (TC26), existing credits/invoices (TC27)
Performance tests: response time (TC32, TC33, TC34)
gaps: Caching behavior validation (ETags, Cache-Control headers) is not tested
401 Unauthorized case not explicitly defined (only 403 for insufficient permissions)
recommendations: Add explicit 401 Unauthorized test case to cover proper authentication failure handling
Add tests for caching headers to ensure proper caching behavior
Add rate limiting/throttling tests under heavy load scenarios
Consider explicit tests for backward compatibility with older clients in more diverse contexts (TC31) beyond basic creation
